section.title: Requirements
section.para: To use the Methodosity Framework components, you need the following:

listitem.para: The Methodosity Framework components use PHP 5.3 features and extensions. You will need PHP 5.3.x in both development and production environments.

section.title: Installing MF
section.para: If you want to install all of the Methodosity Framework, just install the MF package via pear:
One of the advantages of the Methodosity Framework is that its individual components can be installed and used on their own.
